roleset.name: move in a scraping manner
roleset.note: SCUFF-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from scuff.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Children walking home from school would scuff through what [*T*-1] seemed[*-2]to be his foliage .
example.arg: through what [*T*-1] seemed [*-2]to be his foliage
